targets.query: SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as system, mean(usage_nice) as nice, mean(usage_steal) as steal, mean(usage_irq) as irq, mean(usage_iowait) as iowait FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$server$/ and cpu='cpu-total' GROUP BY time($interval*3)
SELECT mean(load1) as load1 FROM system WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$server$/ GROUP BY time($interval*3)
SELECT mean("cpu_usage") FROM "procstat" WHERE process_name <> 'java' and $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$server$/ GROUP BY time($interval*3), exe
SELECT mean("cpu_usage") FROM "procstat" WHERE process_name = 'java' and $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$server$/ GROUP BY time($interval*3), pidfile
SELECT mean("cpu_usage") FROM "procstat" WHERE pidfile = '/var/run/servicepattern/elastic_sync.pid' and $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$server$/ GROUP BY time($interval*3), pidfile
SELECT mean("memory_rss") FROM "procstat" WHERE process_name <> 'java' and $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$server$/ GROUP BY time($interval*3), process_name
SELECT mean("memory_rss") FROM "procstat" WHERE process_name = 'java' and $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$server$/ GROUP BY time($interval*3), pidfile
SELECT mean("memory_rss") FROM "procstat" WHERE pidfile = '/var/run/servicepattern/elastic_sync.pid' and $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$server$/ GROUP BY time($interval*3), pidfile

SELECT mean(active) as active,  mean(available) as available, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(used) as used FROM mem WHERE $timeFilter and host=~ /^$server$/ GROUP BY time($interval*3)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "page_in","page_out" WHERE $timeFilter and "hostname" =~ /^$server$/ GROUP BY time($interval) order by desc

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("swap_total"), 10s),non_negative_derivative(mean("swap_free"), 10s),non_negative_derivative(mean("swap_in"), 10s),non_negative_derivative(mean("swap_out"), 10s) FROM "autogen"."mem" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 10s), non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 10s) FROM "autogen"."net" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("packets_sent"), 10s), non_negative_derivative(mean("packets_recv"), 10s) FROM "autogen"."net" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_time"),10s),non_negative_derivative(mean("read_time"),10s) as "write" FROM "autogen"."diskio" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$server$/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval*5)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"),10s),non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"),10s) as "write" FROM "autogen"."diskio" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$server$/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval*5)

list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "host"
